patthana15.38:4.1: Sārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.38:5.1: Sārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.38:6.1: Anārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naanārammaṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
